feedback: SHAP metrics are a very good help understanding the anomalies. But the Alerts suggested actions are not clear enough for someone outside of the industry.
It is not clear how SHAP explanations can support decision making for NOC operators. It is not very useful from my perspective.

feedback: I am NOT satisfied with the depth of explanation provided by the SHAP algorithm. I prefer following personal on-field experience obtained from 30 years working with satellites .
The SHAP heatmaps are very well done and easy to understand
